price: 25. Uma maray Yallah ateeban heek lakal yaggileeh, Yalli xakbiyyah sinam kah amrissi hee Ramad yargiqeeh, urna taamat baaxo baysa mari, woo mari usun abaaroy Yallih Racmatak ken tayxeere loonuuh, akeeral uma dabqa Ion.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مِيثَٰقِهِۦ وَيَقۡطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
